titleStmt.title: John W. Finnell to Daniel C. Wickliffe
CWG7687

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Military Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
UNITED WE STAND, DIVIDED WE FALL.
KENTUCKY
Head-Quarters Kentucky Volunteers,
ADJUTANT GENERAL'S OFFICE,
Louisville Frankfort Sep: 4. 1862.
Hon: D. C. Wickliffe
Sec: State --

I have this day issued & delivered the following Commissions viz:
Â
Milton T. Callihan Captain date Aug 30. 62
John M. Callihan 2 Lieut: -- " -- " -- " --
Frederick Wyman 2 Lieut: " Sep. 1. '62
Fountaine Finnell Captain date Aug. 30. '62
Joseph T. Smart 21 Lieut: " -- " -- " -- "
William P. Schooler 2 Lieut: " -- " -- " -- "
A. W. Holman 1st Major -- " -- " -- " -- "

Resply
John W. Finnell
Adjt. Genl. Ken Vols.
